features.featureTitle:
Add an admin-only dashboard UI that can be opened from the web app using the URL hash token format and shows all orders with time/date and payment tracking.

The admin view must:
- Be accessible only when the URL contains a valid admin token in the hash (continue supporting the existing pattern `#caffeineAdminToken=91bfa54128abedefcfe01e097af6ca29c994dd64108e32a63467963e477fde15`).
- Display a table/list of orders fetched from the backend, including at minimum: Order ID, item name, quantity, total amount, created date/time, payment status, UTR (if available), and paid date/time (if available).
- Provide order detail view (modal or separate section) to inspect all stored fields for a selected order.
- Use English-only user-facing text in the admin panel.

Add admin panel actions to manage order tracking:
- Allow the admin to change an orderâ€™s status using a dropdown (Pending/Accepted/Preparing/Out for Delivery/Delivered/Cancelled).
- Show a chronological timeline in the order detail view that includes: created time, each status change time, and payment confirmation time (when available).
- Provide quick filters/sorting in the admin list: newest first (default), filter by payment status (Paid/Unpaid), and filter by order status.

Support a separate Admin Panel APK build and a working download link/config for it.

Update the frontend APK configuration so that:
- There is a distinct configuration entry for the customer APK and the admin APK (separate URLs and labels).
- The download/availability-check logic can check and download the admin APK artifact independently from the customer APK.

Add an admin-only download button in the admin dashboard that:
- Checks admin APK availability and initiates download when available.
- Shows a clear English-only message when the admin APK is not available yet.
